ex-officio.translation[0].definitions[0]: an ex-officio member of an organization is only a member because of their rank or position
ex-officio.translation[1].definitions[0]: an ex officio member of a group or organization is a member because of their senior rank or position, not because they have been chosen by others
The National Assembly is composed of 228 members: 168 directly elected, 25 ex officio, and 35 indirectly elected.
